channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-22548] UnalignedCheckpointRescaleITCase.shouldRescaleUnalignedCheckpoint fail due to IllegalReferenceCountException

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This is just a TRACE logging issue. There was indeed a potential illegal access to buffer when printing some TRACE level logs, so it shouldn't affect any users. And it wouldn't be causing any data corruptions even user enabled TRACE logs. (fix is also trivial an will be merged soon)

merged commit 1554292 into apache:master

I think this issue can not occur on the release-1.13 branch, as the extra logging has never been merged there.
